description: This simple sour cream based slaw is a deliciously different way to enjoy fresh leeks.
name: Leek & Apple Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large leek, washed well and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the sliced leek in a colander in the sink and pour over boiling water to soften and set aside to cool. Tip the grated carrot and apple into a large bowl and pour over the lemon juice.
Add the cooled leeks to the bowl with the apple and carrot, season well, stir in the sour cream and serve.
